description:
The Kiznaivers find out the truth about Maki`s past, and try to help her overcome it.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Battle Touching Upon the Identity of the Pain That`s Seven Times the Pain of One-Seventh of a Pain
Le combat qui révèlera la douleur divisée par sept, remultipliée par sept
Shichibun no Ichi no Itami no, Sono Mata Shichibai no Shoutai ni Fureru Tatakai
七分の一の痛みの, そのまた七倍の正体に触れる戦い
